title: LOOKING FOR CLASH TEAMMATES (BRONZE PLAYERS/GIRLS PREFERRED) MID, SUP, ADC

replies.body: Hey! we have a team of 3 people who main all of the roles you are looking for! (unfortunately not girls though).... Added you in-game my IGnm is 'Far'

Hi Mysterious. I would love to join your team.
I mainly play mid/jng bronze

add me on league
pref mid {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
